channel.title: Any news on macOS version?
channel.description: Any news on whether or when macOS port might happen? I was pretty excited hearing that version 1.0 is out and immediately got let down that I can't play it as other Source engine games on my beloved Mac.

item.title: Any news on macOS version?
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Nothing yet. It will be after 1.5 if at all.

Read full topic
